data.name: RPGScenery - Castle Gate Scene
data.detailed_description:
The winding road leads to a stone bridge which arches over a roaring river, fed by a nearby waterfall. The other side of the bridge is closed by a massive iron gate above which a stone tower rises. The tower may be part of some kind of castle that was carved out of the rock around it.

This DLC contains 5 battlemaps to help you to bring your TTRPG session to the next level
